topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5481356d6368724ec0100000#post_5481356d6368724ec0100000
I think the reason why he's so popular is the internet's had enough of the generic snide rude internet commentator and such.  There's a million generic mean internet celebrities, but very few nice honest internet celebrities who are genuinely nice.

It's why I don't watch as many let'splayers any more or such cause it's very rare to see someone as cool of a person as markiplier.

I think eventually there will be a bust in video games let'splayers cause a lot of people on the internet are so used to this idea that being mean to people = views and markiplier shows that people are tired of that generic comedy stick; people like him because he's such a nice person and such and genuinely like him.

He's a nice person and he deserves those viewerships.  I normally use adblock all across the internet, but I actually allow ads on his videos because I want to support him so he can make a living off his stuff.
